issues.title: SSL/TLS Certificate Mismatch
issues.description: The SSL certificate shows ERR_TLS_CERT_ALTNAME_INVALID error. Certificate is configured for futureshive.vercel.app but being accessed via futureshive.com, causing browser security warnings.
issues.recommendation: Update DNS settings to properly point futureshive.com to Vercel. Configure custom domain in Vercel dashboard and generate SSL certificate for futureshive.com.
issues.fixCode:
1. Go to Vercel Dashboard > Project Settings > Domains
2. Add futureshive.com as custom domain
3. Update DNS A/CNAME records as instructed
4. Wait for SSL certificate auto-provisioning
5. Enable 'Redirect www to non-www' if needed
issues.impactEstimate: Can result in 30-50% traffic loss due to security warnings and reduced Google ranking

issues.title: Canonical URL Domain Mismatch
issues.description: Canonical URL points to https://futureshive.vercel.app/ instead of https://futureshive.com. This splits PageRank and authority between two domains.
issues.recommendation: Update canonical URL and all Open Graph/Twitter URLs to use futureshive.com domain
issues.fixCode:
<link rel="canonical" href="https://futureshive.com/">
<meta property="og:url" content="https://futureshive.com/">
<meta property="twitter:url" content="https://futureshive.com/">
issues.impactEstimate: Splitting authority between two domains, confusing search engines about primary domain

issues.title: Multiple H1 Headings Detected
issues.description: Page has multiple H1 elements. Search engines prefer a single, clear H1 per page to understand main topic.
issues.recommendation: Keep only ONE H1 on the page. Convert other headings to H2.
issues.fixCode:
Discover My Simple, Little-Known Trading Strategy

Real Results from Real Traders
issues.impactEstimate: Can reduce rankings by 10-15% due to unclear page focus

issues.title: Title Tag Length Not Optimal
issues.description: Title is 68 characters, exceeding optimal 50-60 character range. Google truncates display after ~60 characters.
issues.recommendation: Shorten title to 50-60 characters for better search result display
issues.fixCode: <title>FuturesHive: Proven Trading Strategy | 94% Success</title>
issues.impactEstimate: 5-10% CTR improvement from better title display

issues.title: Missing Robots.txt File
issues.description: No robots.txt file detected. Search engines may crawl unwanted pages inefficiently.
issues.recommendation: Create robots.txt file with sitemap declaration and crawl directives
issues.fixCode:
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/

Sitemap: https://futureshive.com/sitemap.xml
issues.impactEstimate: Improved crawl efficiency and indexing control

issues.title: Missing XML Sitemap
issues.description: No sitemap.xml detected. This slows indexing and may cause pages to be missed by search engines.
issues.recommendation: Create and submit XML sitemap with all pages and language variants
issues.fixCode:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
  <url>
    <loc>https://futureshive.com/</loc>
    <lastmod>2025-11-05</lastmod>
    <changefreq>weekly</changefreq>
    <priority>1.0</priority>
  </url>
</urlset>
issues.impactEstimate: Faster indexing of new pages and content updates

issues.title: Google Analytics Placeholder ID
issues.description: Google Analytics tracking code uses placeholder ID 'G-XXXXXXXXXX' instead of real Measurement ID. No data is being collected.
issues.recommendation: Create Google Analytics 4 property and replace placeholder with actual Measurement ID
issues.impactEstimate: Enable tracking of user behavior, conversions, and traffic sources

issues.title: Thin Content / Low Word Count
issues.description: Page has only ~150-200 words of body content. Recommended minimum is 800-1000 words for service pages.
issues.recommendation: Add comprehensive content sections: How It Works, FAQ, Student Stories, Getting Started
issues.fixCode:
Target word count: 1,200-1,500 words

Add sections:
- How Our Strategy Works (200-300 words)
- Who This Is For (150-200 words)
- FAQ (400-500 words)
- Student Success Stories (300-400 words)
- Getting Started (200-300 words)
issues.impactEstimate: Increased topical authority and keyword coverage

issues.title: Missing H2-H6 Heading Hierarchy
issues.description: Only H1 and one H2 detected. No H3-H6 usage. Limited semantic structure for content organization.
issues.recommendation: Implement proper heading hierarchy with H2, H3, H4 tags for better content structure
issues.fixCode:
How the Strategy Works

Step 1: Market Analysis

Step 2: Entry Signals

Step 3: Risk Management
issues.impactEstimate: Better content understanding and featured snippet opportunities

issues.title: Excessive Hreflang Tags (30+ languages)
issues.description: 30+ hreflang tags declared but no translated content exists. All URLs return 404. This can be seen as manipulation.
issues.recommendation: Remove all hreflang tags for non-existent pages. Only keep English.
issues.fixCode:
<link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="https://futureshive.com/">
<link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://futureshive.com/">
issues.impactEstimate: Avoid potential Google penalty for misleading international signals

issues.title: Over-Optimization of Schema Markup
issues.description: 15+ schema types on single page including VideoObject with no video, Review with potentially fake review, and empty location data.
issues.recommendation: Remove schemas without supporting content: VideoObject, Review, AggregateRating with no review source
issues.fixCode:
// REMOVE:
- VideoObject (no video exists)
- Review (unless verified)
- AggregateRating (127 reviews claim)
- FinancialService with lat/long = 0

// KEEP:
- Organization
- WebSite
- Course
- BreadcrumbList
issues.impactEstimate: Avoid manual penalty for misleading structured data

issues.title: Generic Logo Alt Text
issues.description: Logo images use generic 'FuturesHive Logo' alt text instead of descriptive, context-specific text.
issues.recommendation: Use descriptive alt text that provides context
issues.impactEstimate: Minor improvement in image SEO and accessibility

issues.title: Meta Keywords Tag (Deprecated)
issues.description: Meta keywords tag is present but has been deprecated by Google since 2009. Provides no SEO value.
issues.recommendation: Remove meta keywords tag entirely
issues.fixCode:
<!-- REMOVE THIS -->
<meta name="keywords" content="...">
issues.impactEstimate: Clean up unnecessary code, prevent keyword strategy exposure

issues.title: External Script Loading Performance
issues.description: Multiple external scripts may be render-blocking. Not all scripts use async/defer attributes.
issues.recommendation: Add defer attribute to all non-critical scripts and implement resource hints
issues.fixCode:
<script src="script.js" defer></script>
<script src="core-web-vitals.js" defer></script>
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://unpkg.com">
issues.impactEstimate: Improved page load speed and Core Web Vitals scores

issues.title: Social Media Tag Inconsistencies
issues.description: Twitter card tags use 'property' instead of 'name' attribute. This may cause cards to not display properly.
issues.recommendation: Fix Twitter meta tags to use 'name' attribute instead of 'property'
issues.fixCode:
<!-- CORRECT -->
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
<meta name="twitter:title" content="...">

<!-- INCORRECT -->
<meta property="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
issues.impactEstimate: Proper display of content when shared on Twitter/X

issues.title: Duplicate/Conflicting Schema Types
issues.description: Organization schema appears multiple times with conflicting types: Organization, EducationalOrganization, FinancialService.
issues.recommendation: Choose ONE primary organization type and use @id to reference it
issues.impactEstimate: Clear, non-conflicting structured data signals

issues.title: Missing Preload for Critical Resources
issues.description: No preload hints for critical fonts or hero images that appear above the fold.
issues.recommendation: Add preload hints for critical fonts and hero background
issues.fixCode:
<link rel="preload" href="/fonts/primary-font.woff2" as="font" type="font/woff2" crossorigin>
<link rel="preload" href="/hero-background.webp" as="image">
issues.impactEstimate: Minor improvement in perceived load time

issues.title: Missing Favicon Sizes
issues.description: Only single favicon declared. Missing multiple sizes for different devices and platforms.
issues.recommendation: Add favicon declarations for multiple sizes
issues.fixCode:
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/favicon-32x32.png">
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="/favicon-16x16.png">
<link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/apple-touch-icon.png">
issues.impactEstimate: Better icon display across all devices

issues.title: Footer Links Missing Internal Link Optimization
issues.description: Many footer links point to # (nowhere) providing no SEO value or user experience benefit.
issues.recommendation: Either create these pages or remove the links
issues.fixCode: Trading Strategy Trading Strategy Trading Strategy
issues.impactEstimate: Improved internal linking structure and user navigation

issues.title: Date Meta Tags Formatting Issues
issues.description: Future dates used (2025-10-31 when current date is 2025-11-05) and inconsistent date formats.
issues.recommendation: Use consistent ISO 8601 format and ensure dates are logically correct
issues.fixCode:
<meta name="date" content="2024-01-15T00:00:00Z">
<meta name="revised" content="2025-11-05T00:00:00Z">
<meta property="article:published_time" content="2024-01-15T00:00:00Z">
<meta property="article:modified_time" content="2025-11-05T00:00:00Z">
issues.impactEstimate: Correct freshness signals to search engines

recommendations: Fix SSL certificate configuration immediately to remove security warnings
Update all canonical and social meta URLs from vercel.app to futureshive.com
Consolidate to single H1 tag per page
Add 800-1,000 words of quality content to page
Remove misleading structured data (VideoObject, fake reviews, empty schemas)
Create robots.txt and XML sitemap files
Implement proper heading hierarchy (H2, H3, H4)
Optimize page speed and Core Web Vitals
strengths: Excellent meta description (165 chars, compelling copy)
Image lazy loading on below-fold images
